data.name: AWS Solutions Architect Associate
data.title: Cloud Architecture & Solutions Design
content: Demonstrated expertise in designing {{distributed systems}} on AWS platform with high availability and fault tolerance.
Proficient in {{AWS core services}} including EC2, S3, RDS, VPC, Lambda, CloudFormation, and IAM for secure and scalable cloud solutions.

data.name: Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect
data.title: Enterprise Cloud Solutions & Architecture
content: Expertise in designing, developing, and managing {{robust, secure, scalable}} cloud architecture solutions using Google Cloud technologies.
Advanced knowledge of {{GCP services}} including Compute Engine, Kubernetes Engine, Cloud SQL, BigQuery, and Cloud Functions.

data.name: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals
data.title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals & Azure Services
content: Foundational knowledge of {{cloud services}} and how those services are provided with Microsoft Azure.
Understanding of {{Azure core services}}, security, privacy, compliance, trust, and Azure pricing and support models.

data.name: Kubernetes Administrator (CKA)
data.title: Container Orchestration & Management
content: Advanced skills in {{Kubernetes cluster}} administration, including installation, configuration, and troubleshooting.
Expertise in {{container orchestration}}, networking, storage, and security within Kubernetes environments.

data.name: Docker Certified Associate
data.title: Container Platform & DevOps
content: Proficiency in {{Docker containerization}} technology, including image creation, management, and deployment.
Knowledge of {{container orchestration}}, networking, and security best practices in Docker environments.

data.name: Terraform Associate
data.title: Infrastructure as Code
content: Expertise in {{Infrastructure as Code}} using Terraform for provisioning and managing cloud resources.
Advanced knowledge of {{Terraform workflows}}, state management, and best practices for automation.

data.name: Certified Information Systems Security Professional
data.title: Cybersecurity & Risk Management
content: Comprehensive knowledge of {{cybersecurity}} domains including security architecture, risk management, and incident response.
Expertise in {{security governance}}, compliance, and implementing security controls across enterprise environments.

data.name: Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH)
data.title: Penetration Testing & Security Assessment
content: Advanced skills in {{ethical hacking}} and penetration testing to identify security vulnerabilities.
Knowledge of {{security assessment}} methodologies, tools, and techniques for defensive security measures.

data.name: CompTIA Security+
data.title: IT Security Fundamentals
content: Foundational knowledge of {{IT security}} concepts, threats, vulnerabilities, and risk management.
Understanding of {{network security}}, compliance, operational security, and cryptography fundamentals.

data.name: Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
data.title: Agile Project Management
content: Expertise in {{Scrum framework}} and agile methodologies for effective project management and team leadership.
Skills in {{facilitating sprints}}, removing impediments, and ensuring team productivity in agile environments.

data.name: Project Management Professional (PMP)
data.title: Enterprise Project Management
content: Advanced {{project management}} skills including planning, execution, monitoring, and closing of complex projects.
Expertise in {{PMI methodologies}}, risk management, stakeholder engagement, and resource optimization.

data.name: ITIL 4 Foundation
data.title: IT Service Management
content: Knowledge of {{ITIL 4 framework}} for IT service management and digital transformation.
Understanding of {{service lifecycle}}, continual improvement, and value creation in IT organizations.
